OUTLINE : Patients undergo abdominoperineal resection ( APR ) perineal colostomy divert loop ileostomy . At least 3 month APR , patient undergo placement Acticon Neosphincter prosthesis . At least 6 week prosthesis placement , prosthesis activate . When patient demonstrate ability operate prosthesis , ileostomy reverse . Quality life assess 6 12 month annually thereafter . Patients follow 6 12 month annually thereafter .
